<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Prayer Attack](/Feats.aspx?ID=6528) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=561" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Prey for Death](/Sources.aspx?ID=231) pg. 109

**Archetype** [Red Mantis Assassin](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=271)

**Prerequisites**
[Red Mantis Assassin Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6519)

**Requirements**
You are wielding a sawtooth saber in each hand.

</column>

---

You've mastered the signature assassination style of the Red Mantis. Attempt to [Feint](/Actions.aspx?ID=2390) an enemy within 30 feet. If your Feint is successful, when you use Prayer Attack on subsequent turns you automatically make the target flat-footed against your melee attacks for that turn without rolling a check to Feint, so long as you remain visible to the target and the target remains within 30 feet of you. If you use your Prayer Attack against a different target, you must attempt to Feint the target normally.

 When you use Prayer Attack, your next successful Strike with a sawtooth saber that turn deals 2d6 [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) to the target.
name: Prayer Attack
requirement: You are wielding a sawtooth saber in each hand.
